KnowledgeBase.Title: cons
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The cons function builds a Pair from object1 which becomes the car and object2 which becomes the cdr.

Brief.Overview: The cons function builds a Pair from object1 {object1} which becomes the car and object2 {object2} which becomes the cdr.
Brief.Usage: The cons function constructs a Pair from any two Analytic Information Server objects.

Argument.Name: object1
Argument.Note: Any Analytic Information Server native or object data type.
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Argument.Name: object2
Argument.Note: Any Analytic Information Server native or object data type.
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
